org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.jclouds.softlayer
Class SoftlayerProvisioningDriver

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.BaseComputeDriver
      org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.BaseProvisioningDriver
          org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.jclouds.DefaultProvisioningDriver
              org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.jclouds.softlayer.SoftlayerProvisioningDriver

public class SoftlayerProvisioningDriver
extends DefaultProvisioningDriver

This driver injects a custom module to jclouds in order to boost poor performance on softlayer.

Since:
2.7.0
Author:
Eli Polonsky
